preferences.description: Pattern for screenshot filenames. Available variables: {mode}, {date}, {time}, {timestamp}

preferences.name: imageFormat
preferences.title: Image Format
preferences.description: Choose the format for saving screenshots. PNG is lossless and best for quality. JPEG offers smaller files with adjustable quality (see JPEG Quality setting below). WebP provides excellent compression with modern browser support.

preferences.name: jpegQuality
preferences.title: JPEG Quality
preferences.description: Compression quality for JPEG format. Higher quality = larger file size. Only applies when Image Format is set to JPEG. Recommended: 85 for general use, 90 for high-quality screenshots, 75 for smaller files.

preferences.name: webpQuality
preferences.title: WebP Quality
preferences.description: Compression quality for WebP format. Higher quality = larger file size. Only applies when Image Format is set to WebP. WebP typically produces smaller files than JPEG at the same quality level.
